website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for an affordable product that travels well, you can't go wrong with this soft dog house.
pros: Ideal for small pets and owners on the go thanks to its stress-free portability
cons: The material is a bit too soft to sufficiently support heavier dogs

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Don't be fooled if you ever purchased the nice foam sturdy cushioned ones ($12 at CVS). This looks similar but is terrible. Arrived with seams split. Instead of nice foam construction it is like a grocery store recycle bag, only cheaper. Packed it up and shipped it back same day. Don't waste your money. It isn't worth more than $1. Can't imagine it could hold up to any use. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M.

customer_reviews.title: I got this to replace one that looks just like it, but my old one had taken a ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace one that looks just like it, but my old one had taken a beating over the last five years from heavy duty ferret play outside. This is a piece of junk. It looks like my old one, but weighs nothing and falls over constantly, if they jump on it it caves in. The material is so cheap the sides fall in all the time. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and small
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 18lb Dachshund/Chihuahua mix, she is not a very big dog. She loves being in under things when she sleeps. Half the time she sleeps under her bed instead of on it. I figured this house would be perfect for her, but it was not. There is NO room for a bed in it and the tiny mat that is in it provides no comfort whatsoever. The house itself stayed tilted and would not stay up right. The bottom of the house, under the thin little mat is an even thinner black mesh that was ripped within only a few days of use. I do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: TraceyE03

customer_reviews.title: This product is a scam the material is not washable ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a scam the material is not washable, is a type of fabric that is not washable material is completely disposable and nowhere implies
customer_reviews.author: Maria Helena Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling!!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot . I have purchased this product many times. Several for myself and a couple for gifts. This doghouse folds up nicely, is lightweight and nice looking!! Love it 😍. So does “Lily”, my Pomeranian 🐶
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: It's portable and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Would have been five stars but only had the item less than a week. It's portable and easy to put together. I have a female Yorkie, she is still hesitant to stay in. She goes in when I bribe her with treats but she doesn't sleep in there yet. The material is fleece like, so she should be warm as the weather continues to drop on the East coast.
customer_reviews.author: flatsdiva

customer_reviews.title: This doghouse bed looks so much better than a kennel or crate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4.5 lb. Chihuahua rescue. The intent was to keep him off my warm bed at night and using this "covered" bed which I now know will keep him warm and snug this winter. This doghouse bed looks so much better than a kennel or crate. I found it more than ease to assemble and I added a pillow. However, it will tip to either side if pillow or dog cause this to become unbalanced. Suggest you put one side against a wall or another object. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: CAVELL

customer_reviews.title: Its cute
customer_reviews.text: This little god house is cute. Even though my little dog will not use it. My cats though has been utilizing it . :) Its really lightweight and you not going to be able to thrash it about. Its pretty soft though I added a fuzzy blanket. It will be perfect for like a small dog maybe up to like 15 pounds maybe a little bigger. The top comes off and there is no carrying handle. It comes in a pretty big box.
customer_reviews.author: Maxie16

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Down for this Dog House
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever purchased. The material on the front and side of the house collapsed after a few days. The house is almost totally ruined after a few months. In the past, I have purchased a house from Walgreens that looked like this. Only that house lasted over 2 years, and was still in better condition than the one I purchased from Amazon is now. And I only paid $8.00 This dog house is definitely a thumbs down for me. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Alves

customer_reviews.title: it was funny to see Sunnee bring a toy into the house ...
customer_reviews.text: This dog house is for my umbrella cockatoo. This is his second house. He loves to take wood in it and chip a way. He also takes the dogs toys and hides them in the house. He played in the older house four years with his sister who recently passed away, it was funny to see Sunnee bring a toy into the house and Blossom throw it out. If this house could stand up to, two cockatoos, then I am sure it will last with a small dog. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Julia Mazzetti

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love to play and sleep in this! It's not the most sturdy thing ever, so I'm not sure how long it'll last though.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this little dog house
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little dog house. It is easy to put away if I need to, it is easy to assemble, and it was very reasonable. Doesn't take up a lot of room and is the perfect size for my 14 lb. Jack Russell Terrier.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Dogs liked it
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say my dogs liked it. They used it for a while but washing it seemed to make the house not as sturdy. Eventually my little dogs started sitting on the house instead of in it. Maybe it would've been different if I only had one little dog. My 2 little ones fit in it fine though. It lasted a good year before we tossed it out. It was a good buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Germaine

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: As long as my babies are happy, I am happy. *** UPDATE*** After using since Christmas, it is falling apart. The quality is horrible. My babies had one prior to this one that took them several years to tear up. They are still happy with it, but I'm not, especially since I'm going to have to buy another one very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: This thing is incredibly flimsy and the dog, who ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredibly flimsy and the dog, who will sit beneath anything, including a little computer bed-desk, won't stay in this thing. Seriously, if my sock is on the floor, our dog will curl up as tightly as possible to fit as much of his body on the sock as possible. He hasn't gone in this thing once by himself, so it's worthless to us.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: It could benefit from having cardboard walls or something to make it more sturdy. I don't think it will last 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a 2 since my dog likes it. Yet, it's flimsy with no support and often binds and collapses. It could benefit from having cardboard walls or something to make it more sturdy. I don't think it will last 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: my dog chihuahua loves it. easy to set up easy to clean. I did place a small bed inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, appropriately so.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, favorite fort/rough house for one of our toy breed dogs. Lasts about a year but receives a lot of abuse when they all attempt to chase each other thru it. Sometimes it becomes a rolling tank of dog glee. We are three or four into our reorders. Inexpensive and meets our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Doggie (& Cat) Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered 2 of these and am glad I did. They are a little bigger than expected but my tiny chihuahua and her big brother, a mini poodle curl up together, completely out of sight. Even my 15lb cat likes them! Very easy to set up anywhere and are almost weightless. I really like this vendor too, I will order from DBROTH again without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Mushroom Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Don't Even Bother
customer_reviews.text: So not worth it. It's flimsy, the material is cheap, and it is just not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: True Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Easy Doghouse
customer_reviews.text: It was really easy to put together but it scared our dog and we had to return it
customer_reviews.author: jesse burgess

customer_reviews.title: Very CHEAPLY made! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made! I was so disappointed when I opened the package and felt how bendable this house is for my 6lb puppy. I put it together anyway and when she gotten in it the house tipped over! I WOULD NOT recommend this at all it’s a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love the Paw Prints!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a slightly larger one I had by Animal Planet. My toy poodle only goes in it to get toys or when he's punished but I love it. Easy to put together. I usually stencil his name on these. I rarely crate my dog but he goes in there when told and lays down.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaT

customer_reviews.title: Not For Dog the Destroyer
customer_reviews.text: I liked it until my puppy sank his rascally teeth into it and destroyed it while I was away from home. If you have a chewer/destroyer/Satan as a pet, opt for a more durable heavyweight plastic dog house rather than this soft (apparently delectable) dog house.
customer_reviews.author: Gusewelle

customer_reviews.title: Great play house for my cats
customer_reviews.text: I use this house for my three cats. They love this and have literally torn it apart playing with it and kicking it with their back feet. Will be ordering them a new one soon.
customer_reviews.author: KaTM

customer_reviews.title: A dog's escape from the humans!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! He is in and out of it all day. It is his escape when he wants to be quiet and sleep we know where he is, he is getting older and sleeps a lot !
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Loved it and just as described! 5 stars! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. This house is like a tent. My maltese got in and flipped it over. It is made out of cheep materials. I had to throw it away after only 2 days. If I could give 0 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Jovana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little dog house for indoors, or to use on your patio. My Yorkshire loves it.
customer_reviews.author: leanne j.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: As the old saying goes, You get what you pay for!! What a crappy product!!! Not only is the product crappy the box looks like it had been opened and taped back up. Probably by another dissatisfied customer. It's very cute until you get it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Busch

customer_reviews.title: Great portable dog house!
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor dog house for a small dog! Quick & easy to assemble, making it very portable. Would be good for in the car too. The material is pretty soft. Just add a dog snuggle blanky and it's ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Richardson

customer_reviews.title: It's was fine up until my Toy Golden Retriever ate it
customer_reviews.text: It's was fine up until my Toy Golden Retriever ate it. Seriously. If your puppy likes to chew on things, you might want to pass on this. Otherwise, it's a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Porable Dog House
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a sheler for a feral kitty I have been taking care of. I bought a few insulated water proof blankets for the inside and an insulated cover for the outside with the cold months coming up. I think it's going to do the job - very well built. It was received packaged nicely and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I got it in the wrong color but that was my fault. The photo showed a tan dog house, so I assumed that's how it would look. I did not see that there was a color changing option and it was set to blue. Regardless, my doggies like it. They use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it and so do we!
customer_reviews.text: We love this dog house because our little guy can now have a "house" in our house. He does not like to be crated, but he loves this house as a place of his own to "hide" his treats and favorite toys.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes it..he is about 18lbs and just fits into it and is still comfortable. If you have a large dog or cat this may not work.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyone

customer_reviews.title: This house is very cute, and it's bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: This house is very cute, and it's bigger than the PAWZ Road Dog House (I got them both to compare.) But the sides aren't stiff at all and bend around so the walls look all warped. My dog still likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Mssalyss

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog tore through it within a few hours. Not the manufacturer's fault though, as our dog is a jerk.
customer_reviews.author: Troubadour

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: it looked flimsy when I pulled it out of the box but it actually holds up when put together. Dog liked it and that's what really matters. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: jeashopper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst dog house ever. Might as well be from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: jpinlvnv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little dog house. I know my Chihuahua is going to love it. It is a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Brands

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a dog house but is also perfect for my cats. I love it; they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary A. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was flimsy and lost its shape so it couldn't stay erect properly.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Start

customer_reviews.title: Gifted.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs hated this thing so I gave it to the older lady across the street and she says her dog loves it. Its hard to get the top on straight. Maybe I am just not coordinated enough. If it was just a little more sturdy (not much) I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, as expected. Our little dog enjoys sitting in it for privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Linde

customer_reviews.title: So cute and adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Installs easily. Perfect fit for a year old yorkie. Looks bigger in the picture. Smaller size than expected but still is a perfect fit for my small yorkie.
customer_reviews.author: Shin J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for little dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved it for a couple of years then it folded and lost it's hold because he would jump on it .
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Hyde

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: I had one dog whom loved her little house. We got a second little dog and he took it over so we had to purchase a second. Cheap price. Ideal for little dogs who get spooked by household chaos. Our puppy takes all his naps in his too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great pretend dog-house for children!
customer_reviews.text: My niece wanted a toy dog house for her stuffed animals. I priced around "real" toy ones - they were either tiny and plastic or not very portable or really expensive. Found this one, which is meant for real dogs, but works great for her favorite stuffed animals! Would really recommend this for kids who love their stuffed pets and want a "house" for them!
customer_reviews.author: N. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Great for cats too! Pad is easy to remove and wash.
customer_reviews.author: Donco

customer_reviews.title: This was really kinda flimsy. Very thin frame pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: This was really kinda flimsy. Very thin frame pieces. It collapsed within a second of trying it. Cute but not for a live animal :(
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cute little house, definitely for smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, has stayed together well, will travel nicely if we ever want to take it anywhere. It's definitely for smaller dogs... our pug has a hard time getting into it, but our smaller pugeranian fits right in.
customer_reviews.author: C. Areal

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my puppy mill rescue
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my puppy mill rescue. Sofie felt very secure in her little dog house. As she felt more secure and trusting, we could fold the roof back till she didn't need it. When we would go out, we would put the roof on so she had a safe haven if she got scared. Has worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A total disaster. Poorly material that ripped of after 3 months. Forget about this product. Choose another product.
customer_reviews.author: kindle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for small doggies. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Debop

customer_reviews.title: Good for Well-Behaved Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog house. It is so cute. As stated, it's well padded for comfort and looks exctly as it does in the picture shown (minus the dog, lol). However, my little puppy is a very mischievous one, so even though she sleeps comfortably in it at night, sometimes a wild streak will take her and she will play with the doghouse... with it ending up overturned and in a drain sometimes :/ So the only downside to it being portable and very light, is that if you don't have a well-behaved dog, the house may not stay put as intended.
customer_reviews.author: sboo99

customer_reviews.title: Cute design VERY poorly made! not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Cute design but sadly lasted 2 nights before the material started to separate from the frame. Returning to Amazon and would not recommend anyone to purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carol and Andy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the picture implies.
customer_reviews.text: That dog in the picture would have to be the size of one of my shoes to fit like that in the image... However I bought this for my cat, and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: OmniNegro

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs would not use and it seemed to not fit together very well.
customer_reviews.author: classico

customer_reviews.title: Great little dog house for my 8lb Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: Great little dog house for my 8lb Chihuahua. she loves It. very comfy cozy for her she has plenty of room in it to move around
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Dog house
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute dog house. It is made of some sort of paper. My puppy art the top of first day. It still exist but looks pretty ratty. It has been eaten all over. Not very sturdy. I thought it was made of fabric. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mericheri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: just fine product for the price. My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was going to be too cheaply made but he loves it. When he wants to hide from us that is where he goes. It is the best thing I have bought him.
customer_reviews.author: BRigney57

customer_reviews.title: LOOOVE THIS DOGGY HOUSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I adore this little indoor house bed! I FINALLY got my furbaby to sleep on her own bed so she can let ME sleep at night! I really wish they had it in pink that would be AWESOME! Either way, she's happy so I'M happy!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great little house!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my 4 small dogs to share and they all loved it so much I ordered another one. It's pretty sturdy and my dogs look so comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: Carla A Chase Pearsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and precisely what I wanted/ordered. This arrived sooner than it had been predicted, so I was very happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Dante5043

customer_reviews.title: ... loves it this is my second one it is great very portable
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it this is my second one it is great very portable.
customer_reviews.author: ssandradee

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love a "den" and these houses work great. I put a small bed or blanket inside and they always want to be the one in the house. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: bb625

customer_reviews.title: Pomeranians love this Dog House
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased a red unit 15 years ago for Sammy the Hammy. We have been looking in all the pet stores for a backup, because Polly the Dolly, our Pomeranian of five years and our first Pomeranian, Sammy the Hammy, both loved this dog house. Sammy passed away at 18 years and the Red unit was passed to Polly five years ago. The Blue unit just received is identical, and the quality is appreciated. At present, Polly is slow at excepting the new color of Blue, so the Red unit continue to be the most popular.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: just OK!
customer_reviews.text: It is just for travel, because it is uncomfortable to dogs, the material is to thin!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Silva

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Cute easy assembly of house. My dog just happens to be to big, darn.
customer_reviews.author: A1970GIRL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great dog house for our little doggy. Very portable and you can take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: I have a bichon Frise so I thought it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Returning. Two flimsy for my dog. I have a bichon Frise so I thought it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: We added a nice soft pillow
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. We added a nice soft pillow. We find our dog belly up and sleeping all the time. Too cute
customer_reviews.author: 2Blessed4dat

customer_reviews.title: Any Animal
customer_reviews.text: My dog hasn't been in it, but the cat's just LOVE IT;) Cats are very happy with it. I do recommend it to any animal.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Way flimsy Er than I expected. It blows away everything there's a storm or heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: I didnt like it, it was too flimsy not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like it, it was too flimsy not sturdy enough. thinking about returning it. very cute but not practical
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Palafox

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog likes this a lot and sleeps in it every night. The only problem I have with it is that is just made of soft foam and fabric so it is not very sturdy or durable. It suits our shih tzu well though.
customer_reviews.author: Gai

customer_reviews.title: No, no, no if you love your pooch
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like chemicals, cheaply made, thank goodness Amazon refunded me the money. My dog deserves far better then this horrible thing. I've learned a lesson when I ordered this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Trish in NY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, and the velcro holds very well. Almost too well.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not for rambunkcuious dogs
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, vey very light duty. My 20 lb Frenchie thinks it is a toy and destroyed it. Fair price.

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 11lb jackuahua! She loves it!! 😍😍

customer_reviews.title: Dog like huts
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes huts and houses and this works for him

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easily stored
customer_reviews.text: sort of flimsy if your dog likes to chew. i have it for young pups just to play in so it's ok until they jump on it and collapse it.

customer_reviews.title: Not for active pups!
customer_reviews.text: the house id not sturdy enough for an active puppy. If they role in it it goes all over the palce. I would reccomend this for a clam older , lazy dog.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy, practical!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought for my animal rescue group. Will be buying more.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! My dog, Rocky loves it too! It's just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Paper House Torn To Bits
customer_reviews.text: Be forewarned, this is a paper house! It's really something for your kids to play in with their stuffed dogs. Not for real dogs at all! They will likely just tear into it if yours like to shred paper. My two Italian Greyhounds had a blast ripping this to bits over the period of a week. So.... it was useful as entertainment for about 7 days. :)
customer_reviews.author: Finn Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Easily torn apart by dog
customer_reviews.text: too soft to hold up. Easily torn apart by dog.
customer_reviews.author: Stylish Comfort rules!

customer_reviews.title: they can both fit in there and they love it so much
customer_reviews.text: This was so cute for my two chchihuahuas, they can both fit in there and they love it so much.

customer_reviews.title: The house was great but I found something I liked better and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: The house was great but I found something I liked better and ordered that from you which is much better 😊

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This portable dog house is great for travel and small dogs.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this and my fur baby uses it all the time :)

customer_reviews.text: The dog house is very cute but very poorly made. My puppy completely destroyed in about 5 minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for what I need. Not very sturdy...but I have a 5lb dog. So it is fine.

customer_reviews.title: Really
customer_reviews.text: I know I only spent twenty bucks but I expected more. I've brought those reusable shopping bags that are more sturdy. It;s a well thought out design but very poorly constructed.

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelter
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fun house for my dog. Easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It's too soft. It is not very used because the doxies don't like it to roll over while they are in it. Way too flimsy.

customer_reviews.title: so funny but i love it
customer_reviews.text: My precious won't go inside yet... so funny but i love it.

product_meta.title: PORTABLE DOG HOUSE - Soft, warm and comfortable and goes everywhere(Assorted colors-Tan/Blue/Red)
product_meta.description: Soft, warm and comfortable and goes everywhere and sets up in secondsThe luxury dog house that you can take with youFolds flat for travel or storage and is fully padded for ultimate comfortMeasures 17" x 16" x 18" fully assembled
feature_bullets: Soft, warm and comfortable and goes everywhere
The luxury dog house that you can take with you!
Folds flat for travel or storage and is fully padded for ultimate comfort
